ComicInfo.Title: Notes #26; Bitchy Bitch Meets Bitchy Butch; Bitchy Bitch Finally Gets Some!; Bitchy Butch Gets Laid
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 20:29:46. [CVDB164600] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 15:18:29. [Issue ID 170739]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sylvia has to talk to Marcie about her unsatisfactory work. Midge and Chuck have another date and discover that her sex toys do the trick for him. Ramona tells Marcie that she's pregnant and that she's been attending her mom's MCC church. Pam Rottweiler reminds everyone that office fraternization is forbidden.
Butchy goes to a Goddess Full Moon Circle dressed in her "good old days" goddess garb and hooks up with a cute dyke, who dumps her the next day when she gets dressed in her normal clothes
